page.title: 05THE MACHINE YEAR
page.content: A sprayer is carried by a tractor, sprays water and chemicals on the crops to kill the weeds. A nodee is carried by a tractor and can be used to sow seed, but more often is used for top dressing and putting fertiliser on the growing crops. Trailers are used for carrying heavy goods or the crop after it has been harvested. Sugar beet machines are rarely used by farmers as the refinery at Felsted has closed down. Sugar beet harvesters lift the ripe sugar beet, cuts the leaves off and throws the beet into a trailer.
